slidelink.displaytext: How to Register for PD Training

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript: <Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="H: Which of the following should you do at the Security Office in the lobby of the RCF building? Select all that apply." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Canvas Icon
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="True or False: Your Canvas inbox is different from your myHCC email inbox." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="K: Which button should you click to access the myHCC Portal? Click it now. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="True or False: Your Canvas inbox is different from your myHCC email inbox." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="To navigate to the Faculty Development page on the myHCC portal, click Menu. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Click Faculty Resources.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Then click Teaching and Learning Resources.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Click Faculty Development.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="This is the Faculty Development page. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Now let’s go to one of the most popular resources on this page, the View Your Classroom tool. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Click View Your Classroom on the menu on the left. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>
